data.title: So worth it!
data.text: Once again the staff at this hotel has exceeded expectations.  My grown son and I stayed on our way to a wedding.  The room was clean and the view of downtown pretty.  The quick walk to Bricktown meant entertainment for him and quality bonding time for me :)  As always, the morning coffee service really adds an element of "spoiled" to a quick overnight.  Will be back often.

owner_response.author: ColcordHotel, General Manager at Colcord Hotel, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Bandimcpherson,

What a sweet review. I am happy to hear that you had some quality time with your son! We are very fortunate to be in such a central location in downtown Oklahoma City. Also, great to hear that you took advantage of our coffee delivery service. Come see us again soon.

Kind Regards,
Blane Thompson
General Manager
Colcord Hotel
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: OKC Bricktown
data.text: Stayed at the Colcord Hotel in OKC for 4 nights.  It was centrally located for all our activities with easy access to freeways without being on a big highway.  We had a lovely corner room, great bed and plenty of water pressure in the shower.  They have a shuttle service that took us to restaurants in Bricktown so didn't have to drive after drinks and wine with dinner.  I would highly recommend this hotel.

owner_response.author: ColcordHotel, General Manager at Colcord Hotel, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Stablebum,

What a great review! I am happy to hear that you took advantage of our amenities like the complimentary shuttle service. Hopefully, after a few drinks the night before, you also took advantage of our complimentary coffee or tea delivery the next morning. We really appreciate you leaving a review. Come stay with us again soon!

Kind Regards,
Blane Thompson
General Manager
Colcord Hotel
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: AWESOME!!!!
data.text: How can you get that many employees to constantly be that nice?  I have never felt so pampered.  I couldn't even walk through the front door without both doors being opened for me.  Every request was attended to immediately and happily.  The room(corner king) was nice and big.  I always read reviews on just about everything I do when I travel and the Colcord certainly lived up to their reviews.  Exceptional...

owner_response.author: ColcordHotel, General Manager at Colcord Hotel, responded to this review
owner_response.text:

It's evident in this review. I hope you took advantage of some of our amenities during your stay. Hope to see you again soon!

Kind Regards,

Colcord Hotel

data.title: Amazing Service With Excellent Hospitality!
data.text:
Kudos and Salutations to Jenni at the Colcord! She made our celebration of my husband's birthday weekend extra special! She went out of her way to make our couples packages work for us and even sent a cupcake to celebrate my husband's special day! Everything about the Colcord is top notch! Fantastic Service with Southern Hospitality that makes this hotel a complete ten!
We loved the turn down service with the cookie and weather card as well as the couples package which gave us the champagne and strawberries every evening. The complimentary coffee/tea service was fantastic and everyone made sure we had an excellent time.
Once again, Thank You Jenni for an amazing time at the Colcord we will never forget our awesome stay!

owner_response.author: ColcordHotel, General Manager at Colcord Hotel, responded to this review
owner_response.text:

Wow, thank you for reviewing your time at Colcord Hotel. Thank you for sharing your experience with our other readers. It's important to us that our guests always feel like Colcord is their home away from home. It's nice to hear that you took advantage of our amenities. After all, that is what they're there for. Please come stay with us again soon!

Kind Regards,
Blane Thompson
General Manager
Colcord Hotel
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Excellent place to stay!
data.text: A beautiful hotel that is located in downtown Oklahoma City.  As I arrived at the hotel  in my airport shuttle, the staff was quick to greet me, pick up my luggage, and then escort me to the front desk.  When I was informed that my room wasn't quite ready (my plane had landed earlier than expected), Colcord insisted on upgrading me to a corner suite so I wouldn't have to wait (and this was complimentary too).  Since I was due in a meeting in an hour, I decided to have lunch at the Colcord's restaurant, the Flint.  Again, another wise choice on my part.  Plenty of choices on the menu followed by prompt service and tasty food.  I have stayed at other hotels in downtown OKC, but the Colcord has been the best to date and I wouldn't hesitate to stay there again on my next trip.

owner_response.author: ColcordHotel, General Manager at Colcord Hotel, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Wyoguy2016,

What a kind review! I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. Glad to know that we could upgrade you to a Corner Suite since your room wasn't ready – it's all about hospitality with us! Come stay with us again soon.

Kind Regards,
Blane Thompson
General Manager
Colcord Hotel
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Overnight stay
data.text: We stayed here for one night during our Route 66 trip. We would have loved to have stayed longer. The hotel is in a beautiful Art Deco building in downtown OKlahoma, a short walk from the Memorial. The room was excellent, the bathroom awesome and the staff fabulous. It is also quite close to the Bricktown area which has canals to walk along and a range of bars and restaurants.

owner_response.author: ColcordHotel, General Manager at Colcord Hotel, responded to this review
owner_response.text:

Kind Regards,
Blane Thompson
General Manager
Colcord Hotel
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Another great visit.
data.text: Had to make a round in OKC last month for quarter-end co-travel with my reps.  Although, I'm smitten with this property, I ALWAYS look for rates to drop just a bit, since I"m on my dime, not the company's.  Scored a nice rate.  Checked in, valet the car, head to the room(I LOVE the room setup--perfect for business and, upcoming, next year, a trip with my wife to see a Thunder game).  Hit the gym(nothing spectacular--but it's stocked with cold water, towels and all the things you need for a good road workout).  The restaurant is on-par with the Colcord.  Convenient and you must try the Buffalo Chili--it's the bomb.  At any rate--pony up and buy a robe.  I wear mine every morning when I get coffee(we live in a condo overlooking an investment firm, LOL).

data.title: Very Nice Hotel and Great Location
data.text: My wife and I stayed at this hotel one night to go to dinner and have drinks in OKC.  It was beautiful and was perfect for dinner at the Flint and dessert and drinks at the Vast in Devon Tower.  We will stay there again while in OKC.

data.title: Small problem taken care of in a big way
data.text: I removed my original review of the Colcord because the issue that had irked me so had been dealt with in a professional and most satisfactory way.  In short, I hadn't received a turn down service, which really meant I was robbed of a cookie.  I had felt that reception's initial response was inadequate...but they really came through the next morning.  Following a heartfelt apology and resolution, I got my cookie!  Correction...cookies!!  Waiting in my car, along with a note.  Now THAT is how a quality hotel and a first class staff takes care of a customer.  An overwhelming and much appreciated gesture...thank you!

owner_response.author: ColcordHotel, General Manager at Colcord Hotel, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
PacificaRob,

We don't claim to be perfect, but we do take pride in quality service and making sure our guests have enjoyed their stay. When one is traveling, the most important thing is staying in a good hotel – we understand and we care. We apologize that you didn't receive turndown service and appreciate your revised review after we corrected our mistake. I hope you'll come stay with us again soon!

Kind Regards,
Blane Thompson
General Manager
Colcord Hotel
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.text: I've always enjoyed the comfort and attention the staff bring me and my fellow co-workers. We've received great service from all the staff that greet us and tend to us during our stay, thanks Colcord Hotel Staff, Valet, and Front Desk. Special Thanks to DeKnisha and Shaneca.

data.title: Great Hotel
data.text:
If in Oklahoma the Colcord  is a must stay it's next to the tallest building in Oklahoma very easy walk to the Brick Town and only 5 blocks away from the Memorial Park. 

The room was very big and very well appointed the staff were lovely.

All round a very nice hotel

Colcord Hotel

data.title: Local Romantic getaway
data.text:
Check-in was so smooth and Jaclyn asked us what floor we desired.  We were able to be on the top floor and the room was magnificent!  The customer service was hands down the best!!! Valet staff were very friendly and professional.  

Snack pantry was convenient as was Flint restaurant.  The food was fresh, fun and hot.  Fitness center was great as well.  I can't say enough great things about our stay here.  

Our room was so romantic.  Comfy king bed with a lovely soft sheets and duvet.  The shower was so clean and large, I took 3 long showers in our 20 hour stay.  2 warm complimentary robes to enjoy which we did.  Had a beautiful view of east side downtown Oklahoma City.  

I would surely recommend this lovely local gem of a hotel to my friends, family and stranger alike.  You will not be disappointed here, you will leave and be ready to come back!  

Thanks Jenni, Jaclyn and valet with the beautiful voice like Morgan Freeman!  The friendliest people in the business!!

owner_response.author: ColcordHotel, General Manager at Colcord Hotel, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Amylrachel,

Thank you for such a wonderful review! And thank you for giving our staff such warm compliments. You are so kind. I'm happy you enjoyed your stay and that you were comfortable and cozy the whole time – that's important. 

Come see us again soon.

Kind Regards,
Blane Thompson
General Manager
Colcord Hotel
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Front Desk Saved The Day!
data.text: In short, Shaneca saved the day.  I stay in OKC regularly, living 2 hours away.  I stayed at Colcord this visit, was given a late checkout, met my son for breakfast there (which is great)...My son was getting married that afternoon; I reserved a room for the newlyweds at another fine hotel, but everything was going wrong.  The arrangements I had made by phone were not done nor would they be, the hotel was quite chaotic because of construction.  I called "my" hotel (COLCORD) and they made every need I had happen instantly, including early check in to leave a gift in the room.  Robes are furnished (had to request at the other) and I added his name to the room so he had ability to sign for dinner, etc.  I am sorry to say, the other hotel was not helpful with that arrangement.  Shaneca assured me she would make their visit as easy for them as possible.  The extra bonus?? Saved $100 on the room.  The other room was $250.  For none of my requests.  My son LOVED the hotel and it is now his favorite as well.

owner_response.author: ColcordHotel, General Manager at Colcord Hotel, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hewsmom,

What a kind review! I so appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your experience. Shaneca is such a great asset to our team! I am happy to hear that we could accommodate your requests and everything worked out perfectly. Once again, thank you for staying at Colcord Hotel.

Kind Regards,
Blane Thompson
General Manager
Colcord Hotel
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: The Hotel is Wonderful
data.text:
The Colcord Hotel is every bit as lovely as shown in the pictures.The room with two queen beds and a sitting area was very large with the vanity sinks in an alcove and next to it, a large closet. Next to that the bathroom area -- and there it lost a couple of points in that there were no safety grips for getting in and out of the tub and not enough hooks. (The front desk staff took this complaint seriously.)

The staff were all just wonderful -- the front desk, the restaurant and the valet/driver. The driver took my group of six to the art museum and picked us up. Very courteous. (We tipped him generously.)

We had a nice view and the hotel is across the street from a most beautiful garden/botanic garden. Close to Bricktown -- a wonderfully vibrant place with shops, eateries and a canal, along which is a enthralling 15 piece one-and- half-times life-size bronze sculptures of pioneers and their horses.  

The Cowboy Museum is a bit of a drive away but worth the time.

All said, our hotel and Oklahoma City itself far exceeded our expectations. No disappointments, A very good value.

data.title: Yo
data.text: I was a bit rough on this hotel with my last review of it.  I stay here around 4 or 5 times a year for work.  It really is a nice building, well restored.  I still don't care for the mattresses or the fact I have to order my coffee in advance, and the restaurant is not great -but the service was a bit better this trip, but it is a nice hotel.  Fancy, right.  Anyway, the desk people are nice.

data.title: a fine ole classic
data.text:
The Colcord is a fine, updated, classic hotel unlike most others claiming to be 5 star properties, the Colcord is the real McCoy. The property, staff, location are all excellent!

Small in size, the hotel has a instant feel of luxury. 

I'll be back!

data.title: Top shelf OKC location!
data.text:
I love the Colcord. We have stayed here many times. It is very close to the Chesapeake, if you happen to be going to a concert or ballgame. It is across the street from Mahogany's. But if you haven't tried te Colcord's restaurant, Flint, do yourself a favor and try it!  Great food, superb Sommelier, patio dining will give you excellent people watching in Bricktown. The Colcord has very nice rooms. Be sure to notice the original mailbox by the elevator. The rooms are much quieter than its "haunted" neighbor hotel, and it features Le Occitane toiletries and big fluffy towels. My only complaint this trip was that the sheets were not as soft and comfy as I remember. 
Book the Colcord for its location, fall in love with it for its service!

data.text: This is a very nice hotel located downtown OKC across the street from Chesapeake Arena.  The rooms are spacious and comfortable.  The beds were very comfortable.  The rooms were very clean.  The staff was very nice and helpful.  Will stay here again.

data.title: Comfortable well located hotel.
data.text:
Excellent staff support and service.
Jenni Aguiar went the extra mile in making our stay pleasnt, by making suggestions for restaurants , including reservations.
Within walking distance of the Art Museum, the Myriad Botanic Garden, and the National Memorial.
They have complimentary tea or coffee service in the mornings. Addind some biscuits to this service would be nice.
Hotel is om the Oklahoma Historic Register
Recommend this highly.

data.title: great overnight stay for wifes belated birthday
data.text: we stayed there on a Saturday night 8/20/16.  They have $25 valet overnight parking which we used.  Pricey but worked out well.  The staff is very proficient and nice.  We checked in at 3:00 pm and went down to their Flint restaurant.  Went to their outdoor patio for drinks and meeting friends.  Nice area for sight seeing.  We went to Mahogany next door for appetizers and then to JJ's later that night.  We also went to a local bar.  My wife had recently had her knee replaced so walking was out.  They have free shuttle service throughout Bricktown.  Great service.  They took us where we wanted to go and promptly picked us up when we called them.  That was a huge plus considering the wifes condition.  We returned to the hotel around midnight and the Flint outdoor patio was rocking.  We finished off the evening with a night cap.  Next morning we had breakfast at Flint and it was excellent.  Nice atmosphere at Flint.  Our room was excellent.  Overall the place is classy, located close to everything in Bricktown and midtown OKC.  The shuttle service is outstanding if you plan on roaming.

owner_response.author: ColcordHotel, General Manager at Colcord Hotel, responded to this review
owner_response.text:

Colcord Hotel
